PERSONA:
meet sandra, a 56-year-old african american woman living in a metropolitan area on the west coast. she holds a college degree and has pursued some post-graduate education. born and raised in the united states, sandra is a divorced woman who identifies as a protestant and attends religious services more than once a week.

politically, sandra leans towards the republican party and holds very conservative views. despite her strong political leanings, she is not currently registered to vote at her current address. her annual family income falls within the $40,000 to $50,000 range, placing her in the middle-income tier.

sandra is an active member of her community and regularly volunteers her time and efforts. she is tech-savvy and uses the internet multiple times a day. in her free time, she enjoys exploring the diverse cultural offerings of her metropolitan area and spending time with friends and family.

while sandra has faced challenges in her personal life, she remains resilient and committed to her values and beliefs. her strong faith and active involvement in her community provide her with a sense of purpose and fulfillment.
